name: Logos
description: Here is a planet whose Supreme Lord, Main Logos can be You! The fate of mankind and fauna who inhabit the planet and that of the wandering extraterrestrials may be in your hands. Teach them or destroy them, set the army of the undead on them, or blow them up with an alien invasion.
minimum_requirements: OS: min. Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.7 GHz or faster x86-compatible processor with SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card:
